name: Bloodthirster
passive: Overheal: Excess healing is converted into a shield, up to 350 (+140% bonus AD).
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Speed. Passive effect: Excess healing is converted into a shield, up to 350 (+140% bonus AD).. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: The shield from Overheal provides extra survivability
Great for ADCs who need sustain and damage
Build this when you need to survive burst damage
The lifesteal allows you to heal from minions between fights
Consider building this against poke compositions
